X.ST: Meet , a video game created inside a video game that has taken on a life all its own. Simply conceived -- it plays as if mated with bingo -- it is nevertheless changing the way people look at their virtual world. Commentary by Clive Thompson.

ARTICLE.COMMENT: When a video game is a hit inside a virtual world.

X.T: Tric Trac Show #33 - Mikaël LE BOURHIS & Sarah FAVARON

ARTICLE.COMMENT: Les Tribus Du Vent, Twilight Inscription, District Noir, Challengers, Sea Salt & Paper, Look At The Stars, a visit of Days Of Wonder’s office, and Access+, the Asmodee’s studio in charge of adapting games for adapted to people with cognitive disabilities.

X.T: Tric Trac Show #34 - Sébastien DUJARDIN, Philippe NOUHRA & Charlotte NOAILLES

ARTICLE.COMMENT: Airmail, Orichalque, Tokaido Duo, Lofoten, an interview of SébastienDujardin, a visit of a Cultura shop, and the history and the games of Funforge.

X.T: Tric Trac Show #35 - Maud CHALMEL & Thibaut de la Touane

ARTICLE.COMMENT: Heat, Clockworker, Super Mega Lucky Box, Turing Machine, the games of Triton Noir, a visit of Volumique workshop, and a interview of MaudChalmel.

X.T: Tric Trac Show #36 - Olivier MELISON, Jamie PARSONS, Georgina PARSONS & François BACHELART

ARTICLE.COMMENT: Some games seen in Essen, Skymines, Toko Island, Fun Facts, Aurignac, the games of Holy Grail Game, and the games of Nostromo Editions.

X.T: Tric Trac Show #37 - Mélanie TOUBEAU, Frank LEFEBVRE & Adrien MARTINOT

ARTICLE.COMMENT: Carcassonne Ombre Et Brouillard, Hellton Palace, Piège Obscur, Pagan, some games for Halloween, a visit of Playin, Days of Wonder’s Les Aventuriers du Rail and Heat.

X.T: Tric Trac show #38 - François-Gilles Ricard, Frédéric Vuagnat & Éric Fortunato

ARTICLE.COMMENT: Fédération, Hero Quest, Tracks, Settlement, Splendor Duel, Vivarium, Ludovox, and Platypus Game.

X.T: Tric Trac Show #39 - Shadi TORBEY & Stéphane ANQUETIL

ARTICLE.COMMENT: La Chute Du Roi De La Montagne, East India Companies, Maui, Les Tours Ambulantes, a visit to Asmodee, the interviews of ShadiTorbey and of StéphaneAnquetil.

X.T: Tric Trac Show #40 - Laurène CHARTIER, Florent Baudry & Florent TOSCANO

ARTICLE.COMMENT: Suburbia, La Guilde Des Expéditions Marchandes, Qawale, Mysterium Kids, an interview about Les Animaux De Baker Street, an interview of Manuel Rozoy, and the games of Jeux Opla.

X.T: Tric Trac Show #41 - Jérémie FLEURY & Germain WINZENSCHTARK

ARTICLE.COMMENT: Rallyman Gt, Bitoku, Canvas : Reflets, World Championship Russian Roulette, Peter Et Les Enfants Perdus, the extension of Nouvelles Contrées, a visit of Le Centre ludique (CLuBB) at Boulogne-Billancourt, an interview of JérémieFleury.

X.T: Tric Trac Show #42 - Damien CHAUVEAU & Giordano OTTAVIAN

ARTICLE.COMMENT: King Of Monster Island, Le Grand KiwiZ, Flashback: Zombie Kidz, ETTIN : L'Union fait la Force, the history of Intrafin, an interview of DamienMaric, and Hybris.

X.T: Tric Trac Show #43 - José Chaves

ARTICLE.COMMENT: Familiar Tales, Cora Quest, 1923: Cotton Club, Ttmc2, La Planche des Pirates, a visit of French Wargame Café, and an interview of JoséChaves.

X.T: Tric Trac Show #44 - Philippe des Pallières

ARTICLE.COMMENT: Colt Express - Convoyeurs & Train blindé, Encyclopédia, Quartermaster General: 1914, Tiletum, a visit of The Good Game, and an interview of Philippedes Pallières.

X.T: Tric Trac Show #45 - Laure-emmanuelle Marion & Franck Dichamps

ARTICLE.COMMENT: Twilight Struggle, Eleven, Bristol 1350, Disney Sorcerer’S Arena: Epic Alliance, and the Festival des Jeux Vichy.

X.T: Tric Trac Show #46 - Voilà... C'est fini !

ARTICLE.COMMENT: The end.
